mapper.select: select id, label_name, sort_num, category_id, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted from subject_label where id = #{id}

select id, label_name, sort_num, category_id, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted from subject_label where id in
#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into subject_label(label_name, sort_num, category_id, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{labelName}, #{sortNum}, #{categoryId}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted})

insert into subject_label(label_name, sort_num, category_id, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.labelName}, #{entity.sortNum}, #{entity.categoryId}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})

insert into subject_label(label_name, sort_num, category_id, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.labelName}, #{entity.sortNum}, #{entity.categoryId}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})
on duplicate key update label_name = values(label_name), sort_num = values(sort_num), category_id = values(category_id), created_by = values(created_by), created_time = values(created_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted)
mapper.update:
update subject_label
label_name = #{labelName},
sort_num = #{sortNum},
category_id = #{categoryId},
created_by = #{createdBy},
created_time = #{createdTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
where id = #{id}
